ygData.subject: SV: spell
ygData.msgSnippet: when do we get that spell ? wich level that is /Askur ... From: Aura Dracul  To:  Sent: Wednesday,
ygData.messageBody:
when do we get that spell ? wich level that is

/Askur

----- Original Message -----
From: Aura Dracul <auradracul@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 9:08 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] spell


> From: "Aura Dracul" <auradracul@...>
>
> Shock of Thunder seems to be doing this now..not very far..but it does hurl
> them back a few paces...
>
> Auraelle
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 1:42 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] spell
>
>
> > From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
> >
> > Hey, I remember somebody posting a couple days ago about our lack of melee
> > ability. I agree more often than not, we have to turn tail to run to the
> > zone. I've always thought it would be cool to have that spell those
> > Tentacle Terrors have in Najena...you know, the ones that knock you back
> ten
> > billion feet. :) It wouldn't even need to give damage...but if it was
> able
> > to knock a whole mob of creatures away from your body for a few
> secs...that
> > would aid a whole lot in terms of survivability. Would make a good escape
> > combo with Shadow step.
> >
> > -- Lim'Dul
> >
